name: Fall 2016 - 470 - InaZuma
description:
All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services

Description:

InaZuma is a single player third person action game. A lone female space ninja takes on overwhelming might of an interstellar fleet. Her mission is to infiltrate their flag ships and destroy them from the inside out.

InaZuma combines fast paced action game play with fluid motions and controls. Theses mechanics combined with the targeting system allows the player to fight swiftly from enemy to enemy. Use your agility to out maneuver and decimate your enemies. Requires Gaming Controller.

Video:


Install Instructions:

1. Download the InaZuma zipped file.

2. Extract the file using your favorite file extracting software. (I prefer WinRAR).

3. Double click InuZuma.exe

4. Run the game with your preferred graphic settings.

System Requirements:

OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10

Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.

CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.

A Gaming Controller: (Xbox 360 Controller is Ideal)
